name: Anti-Metal
description:
The project was developed for the Rapid Prototyping course (GDE-210) at Southern New Hampshire University.

How to play:

+ Hold WASD to move.

+ Press Space to jump. When you are close to a ledge, move forward to leap over.

+ Hold Ctrl to crouch. Hold Ctrl while moving to slide.

+ Hold LMB to shoot.

+ Press RMB to fire a teleport projectile. Press RMB again to teleport to that project.

+ Press ESC to exit the game.

Credits:

+ Nate Kaplan (artist): Level Design, 3D Models

+ Liam Shelton (programmer): Combat, Lightning

+ Khoi Ho (programmer): Player Movement, AI
